articles.title: Crime in Argentina. The women murdered a 5-year-old boy
articles.description: In Argentina, a 5-year-old boy named Lucio was murdered. The murder was committed by a couple of women who were raising a child. The women used to take the boy to pro-abortion and feminist marches. The child had seizures The boy died on November 26 after he was taken to a hospital in Santa Rosa. …
articles.content:
In Argentina, a 5-year-old boy named Lucio was murdered. The murder was committed by a couple of women who were raising a child. The women used to take the boy to pro-abortion and feminist marches.

articles.title: Science News Roundup: France to mimic Musk with own SpaceX-style launcher, minister says; Omicron may raise re-infection risk; booster protection documented and more
articles.description: Argentina was one of the first countries to widely use Russia's Sputnik V COVID-19 vaccine, but delays in deliveries led the country in August to offer second doses of Moderna and AstraZeneca vaccines to citizens who received a first dose of Russia's Sputnik V. Omicron may raise re-infection risk; booster protection documented The following is a summary of some recent studies on COVID-19.
articles.content:
Following is a summary of current science news briefs.
Russia says Argentina approves Sputnik Light as standalone and booster vaccine

articles.title: Argentina detects first Omicron case, health ministry says
articles.description: Argentina has detected its first case of the Omicron coronavirus variant in a person who had traveled from South Africa, the country's Health Ministry said.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES — Argentina has detected its first case of the Omicron coronavirus variant in a person who had travelled from South Africa, the South American country’s Health Ministry said late on Sunday.

articles.title: Brazil's crop-weather hits a 30-year dryness mark
articles.description: As a typical La Niña weather pattern takes hold of South America, dryness has deepened across southern Brazil and parts of Argentina.
articles.content:
La Niña’s influence on South America weather is becoming more pronounced heading deeper into December.
Rainfall deficits are growing across southern Brazil and portions of the growing regions of Argentina, a typical weather pattern associated with La... [2258 chars]

articles.title: 'Some sniper decided to get me in the back of the leg' - Ulster star Iain Henderson on his injury trouble
articles.description: Iain Henderson has revealed how it felt like a "sniper" had taken him out after he was forced to withdraw at the last minute from the Irish side that completed a November international clean sweep by humbling Argentina.

articles.title: Argentina Stun 6-time Champions Germany to Win Second Junior Hockey World Cup Title
articles.description: Lautaro Domene scored a hat-trick as Argentina beat Germany 4-2 to win their second FIH Junior Men's Hockey World Cup title.
articles.content: Lautaro Domene struck a hat-trick as a determined Argentina stunned six-time champions Germany 4-2 to clinch their second FIH Junior Men’s Hockey World Cup title at the Kalinga Stadium here on Sunday. Domene converted three penalty corners in the 10t... [1519 chars]

articles.title: Men's Junior Hockey World Cup 2021: Lautaro Domene's hat-trick helps Argentina stun Germany, clinch 2nd title
articles.description: Domene converted three penalty corners in the 10th, 25th and 50th minute, while Franco Agoistini (60th) scored a field goal just seconds from the final hooter to hand Argentina their second title.

articles.title: Florida man stabbed co-worker who refused to date him
articles.description: Agustin Lucas Mariani, 20, faces second-degree murder charges for the fatal stabbing of Delfina Pan, a 28-year-old from Argentina who had refused to date him.
articles.content:
A Miami Beach man whose repeated romantic advances to a restaurant co-worker were rejected killed her outside her apartment, according to reports.

articles.title: Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik lauds successful completion of Hockey Junior WC in Bhubaneswar
articles.description: Curtains came down on another fantastic hockey event in Bhubaneswar when the FIH Odisha Hockey men's Junior World Cup 2021 ended on Sunday with Argentina lifting the title at the iconic Kalinga Hockey Stadium.
